subject: Re: TAPSCON Clearwater Florida
author: eastern_paranormal
full_text:
The Tapscon seemed more fan based to us. We are going to Para-con at 
Penn. State.

Gab

www.easternparanormal.com 



--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, "kolrone" <a.cronk@...> wrote:
>
> I tried sending this yesterday (Friday), but I guess it didn't go 
through. "I know how some people feel about the TAPS guys, but is 
anyone going to TAPSCON ( http://tapscon.com/)in Clearwater, 
Florida this weekend? I can't make it on Saturday, since I have to 
work, but I'm thinking about going on Sunday. If you go to the site 
it has a live feed (which I plan to watch at work)and its venue, 
etc. There's going to be all kinds of different stuff, but I don't 
know if it's worth the money. I think it'd be interesting to go 
though."
>  
> -Aaron
>
